<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o wguide1.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>

out awg1 endin
